Class DevelopmentDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Table.Decks.DevelopmentDeck
public class DevelopmentDeck extends Object
This Class represents the decks of development cards

    • draw

      public DevelopmentCard draw​(int x, int y) throws DrawnFromEmptyDeckException, IndexOutOfDevelopmentDeckException
      This method draws the card on top of the selected deck if all the cards of that type are gone and we are in the case of solo-game, calls the end of the game
      Parameters:
      x - : the chosen row
      y - : the chosen column
      Returns:
      the selected card, of type DevelopmentCard
      Throws:
      DrawnFromEmptyDeckException - if the deck selected is empty
      IndexOutOfDevelopmentDeckException - if you are out of bound of DevelopmentDeck

    • discard

      public void discard​(Type type)
      This method discards two cards of the same type as the action token
      Parameters:
      type - : is the color of the action token drawn

    • export

      public String export()
      This method exports the DevelopmentDeck to a String
      Returns:
      a string with all the deck data, of type String
